subject: CONS
name: Econ & Social Aspects of CBio
fullname: Economic and Social Aspects of Conservation Biology
info: Economic/social aspects of conservation biology. Ecological economics, human dimension of conservation biology, values of conserving species/ecosystems.prereq: CBio student or instr consent

subject: CONS
name: Contemp.Prob. Conservation.Bio
info: Comprehensive review of conservation biology issue. Written exam.prereq: 8004, FW 8452, instr consent

subject: CONS
name: Research in Support of ResMgmt
fullname: Research in Support of Resource Management: a Dialog With Land Managers
info: Effective communication between researchers and natural resource managers. Organized around research needs of land managers. Students select topics of interest from these needs and, as small teams, prepare short research proposals to address each topic.

subject: CONS
name: How to Excel in Grad School
fullname: How to Excel in Graduate School
info: Overview of history/philosophy of science as framework for writing thesis or dissertation. How to conduct research. Time management.

subject: CONS
name: FTE: Master's
info: (No description)prereq: Master's student, adviser and DGS consent

subject: CONS
name: FTE: Doctoral
info: (No description)prereq: Doctoral student, adviser and DGS consent

subject: CONS
name: Doct Pre-Thesis Cr*
info: TBDprereq: Doctoral student who has not passed prelim oral; no required consent for 1st/2nd registrations, up to 12 combined cr; dept consent for 3rd/4th registrations, up to 24 combined cr; doctoral student admitted before summer 2007 may register up to four times, up to 60 combined cr

subject: CONS
name: Thesis Credit:Mast*
info: (No description)prereq: Max 18 cr per semester or summer; 10 cr total required [Plan A only]

subject: CONS
name: Thesis Credit:Doct*
info: Doctoral thesis credit.prereq: Max 18 cr per semester or summer; 24 cr required; prior to passing written and oral prelims, must have: 1 yr coursework in program; approval on a degree program; 1-2 pg research proposal (approved by adviser) to DGS asst
